name: Little People's Movin' & Groovin'
description: Tots and caregivers explore a world of improv, dance and drumming with movement and call back. Children are encouraged to speak in class, learn to follow directions and play with others through music, percussion, movement, rhythm and motion.
fullDescription: Tots and caregivers explore a world of improv, dance and drumming with movement and call back. Children are encouraged to speak in class, learn to follow directions and play with others through music, percussion, movement, rhythm and motion.
whatTheyOffer: Tots and caregivers explore a world of improv, dance and drumming with movement and call back. Children are encouraged to speak in class, learn to follow directions and play with others through music, percussion, movement, rhythm and motion.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
